name: Designation L-22
description:
Take on the role of an archeology scholar from a far-off future, salvaging ancient artifacts from the clutches of feisty bacteria. Prevent the spread of decay by managing your funds and buying Microbot units, each with their own unique abilities.

Perhaps along the way uncover the secrets each artifact holds.

Have fun!

Designation L-22 was created for Guldhall's SD Winter Game Jam with the theme of 'Decay'.
